title: Summer is coming! Pool Party ideas !
body: It crossed my mind , what if GANKPLANK got a pool party skin , totally fits in. Someone draw that !! ty for your time upvote so some artist can see and get inspired. AHOY ! {{champion:41}}

replies.body:
My personal picks for the Poolparty this year would be:

{{champion:142}} Already confirmed
{{champion:133}} Wearing a swimsuit and valor is a seagull would be perfect, especially since seagulls are used in Zoes E as well, matching thematic
{{champion:245}} Poolnoodle as a weapon, Q is a frisbee, W is a big bubble, E has watersplash effects, R is him doing the cannonball
{{champion:61}} She has a beachball and I think her skills would look amazing with water effects
Oriana should get a dunkmistress skin , she has the 'basket' ball and could look dop3 :D
How would that even work?  A bathing suit on his armor? lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=rnJ0JaE4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-04-18T18:51:25.468+0000)
>
> How would that even work?  A bathing suit on his armor? lol.

Morde floatie? idk
Eve just got a skin and Galio and Rakan recently too, so doubt we'd see them.
Eve definitely won't get it, she already has the Bloodmoon skin on the PBE and I highly doubt that she will get another one so close after.

Pool party {{champion:90}} 

Passive alternates between sand with shells and water with starfishes

Q is two clams spitting pearls at each other

W is crabs instead of voidlings

E is one of those floating ring things (forgot what they are called)

R is water, fish, shells, starfish, plastic buckets and shovels, just a flood of water and beach stuff

Appearance would be like a life guard
